ctx: intros f g x Hloc Hcontf.
exceptions.tactic: apply Hloc in Hy as [eps Hep].

original: intros f g x Hloc Hcontf. apply continuity_pt_locally_ext with (a := 1); try lra. intros y Hy. apply Hloc in Hy as [eps Hep]. exists eps. intros y' Hy'. apply Hep in Hy'.
